name: sidekick-cli
readme_summary: Sidekick is an agentic CLI developer tool that allows users to enhance their command-line workflows with AI. It offers features like LLM provider flexibility, MCP support, and per-project customization, aiming to provide an open-source alternative to similar tools while maintaining an agentic workflow.
cover_image_prompt: Imagine a skilled artisan at a digital forge, shaping raw command-line interfaces (CLIs) into powerful, intelligent tools. The artisan, representing Sidekick, uses a magical hammer that transforms basic CLI commands into agentic workflows. Sparks of AI intelligence fly as the hammer strikes, imbuing the CLI with advanced capabilities. Around the forge, blueprints display various LLM providers, showcasing Sidekick's flexibility. A subtle UI overlay shows token tracking and cost estimations. The scene is set in a bright, modern workshop with a clean, focused composition. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with vibrant colors and crisp details.

name: weblookrs
readme_summary: WebLook is a command-line tool designed for capturing screenshots and recordings of web pages. It offers features such as configurable wait times, viewport sizes, JavaScript execution, and browser console log capture. The tool is intended to support local development workflows by providing a simple way to capture visual states of web applications.
key_features: Animated GIF recording of web pages
Configurable wait time and recording length
primary_use_case: Capturing screenshots and recordings of web pages for local development and testing.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled cartographer meticulously charting a digital world map, using a specialized lens to capture snapshots of various locations and moments in time. The cartographer's desk is adorned with glowing screens displaying web pages and animated GIFs, representing the captured content. A subtle UI element shows a progress bar and countdown timer. The scene is set in a bright, modern studio with a clean, focused composition. The image should be in a flat design style with clear iconography and a vibrant color scheme.

name: shellfirm
description: Intercept any risky patterns (default or defined by you) and prompt you a small challenge for double verification
readme_summary: Shellfirm intercepts potentially dangerous shell commands and prompts users with a verification challenge, acting as a 'captcha for your terminal'. It helps prevent accidental data loss or system damage by requiring users to confirm risky actions. The tool supports customizable patterns and integrates with Zsh and Bash.
key_features: Prompts users with challenges for verification
primary_use_case: Preventing accidental or harmful shell commands from being executed.
cover_image_prompt: A vigilant gatekeeper stands before a glowing terminal, intercepting dangerous commands represented as shadowy figures. The gatekeeper holds a magical captcha shield, challenging each command with a puzzle of light. Successful commands transform into harmless sparks, while failed attempts are contained. UI elements on the terminal display real-time command analysis and security metrics. The scene is set in a futuristic server room with cool, blue lighting. The image should be in a digital painting style with clean lines and clear details, emphasizing the protective nature of the tool.

name: KrbRelayEx
readme_summary: KrbRelayEx is a C# tool designed for Kerberos relay attacks, enabling Man-in-the-Middle exploitation by manipulating DNS entries. It relays Kerberos AP-REQ tickets to access SMB shares or HTTP ADCS endpoints, offering features like multithreaded SMB consoles and port forwarding. The tool is cross-platform compatible and intended for legitimate security testing and research.
primary_use_case: Performing Man-in-the-Middle (MitM) attacks by relaying Kerberos AP-REQ tickets to access SMB shares or HTTP ADCS endpoints.
cover_image_prompt: Imagine a skilled stage magician redirecting a beam of light (representing network traffic) with mirrors (representing DNS manipulation) towards a treasure chest (representing sensitive data). The magician wears a modern suit with subtle circuit patterns. The light beam initially targets a decoy chest, but the magician cleverly redirects it. Small holographic displays show Kerberos tickets and network packets flowing along the beam. The stage is set in a dimly lit server room with glowing server racks in the background. The scene is dramatic and mysterious. The image should be in a digital painting style with vibrant colors and sharp focus, emphasizing the illusion and redirection.

name: Free-Proxy
description: Hi there will be a lot of proxies here.
readme_summary: The Free-Proxy repository provides a collection of free proxy servers. It includes installation instructions for both Termux and Linux, a proxy checker, and update functionality. The repository aims to offer readily available proxies for users on these platforms.
primary_use_case: Providing a list of free proxies for use in Termux and Linux environments.
cover_image_prompt: Imagine a bustling marketplace where vendors offer various goods (proxies) from their stalls. A central figure, a 'Proxy Broker,' stands tall, sifting through the offerings with a magnifying glass (proxy checker). He carefully selects the best and most reliable proxies, discarding the faulty ones. Behind him, a digital screen displays a real-time list of verified proxies, glowing with a healthy green light. Terminals with Linux and Termux logos are subtly integrated into the stalls, representing the supported platforms. The scene is set in a vibrant, slightly futuristic marketplace with a focus on clarity and ease of access. The illustration should be in a flat design style with clear iconography and a bright, inviting color scheme.

name: ballcat
readme_summary: Ballcat is a rapid development scaffolding that enables developers to quickly build enterprise-level backend management systems. It provides pre-built starters for extending functionality and includes features such as user separation, menu/data permissions, logging, exception handling, and security measures like XSS and SQL injection prevention. The project aims to simplify and accelerate the development process for enterprise applications.
primary_use_case: Rapidly building enterprise-level backend management systems.
cover_image_prompt: Imagine a skilled architect meticulously assembling a grand building from various pre-fabricated modules, each representing a different function like security, user management, or data handling. The architect, representing the developer, effortlessly snaps these modules together, creating a robust and feature-rich enterprise system. Blueprints on a nearby table subtly display code snippets and UI elements. The building glows with a soft, internal light, symbolizing the system's efficiency and ease of use. The scene is set in a bright, modern workshop with a clean, organized aesthetic. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with vibrant colors and sharp details.

name: Peergos
description: A p2p, secure file storage, social network and application protocol
readme_summary: Peergos is a decentralized platform focused on providing users with complete control over their data and online interactions. It achieves this through a peer-to-peer encrypted filesystem with fine-grained access control, a secure messenger, encrypted email, and a private social network. The platform aims to create a private web where users own their data and decide who can access it.
primary_use_case: Secure, private, peer-to-peer file storage, social networking, and application hosting with user-controlled data and privacy.
cover_image_prompt: Imagine a bustling, secure digital city where personal data is represented as uniquely crafted keys. Citizens (users) confidently manage their keys, deciding which buildings (applications) can access which keys (data). A central tower, 'Peergos,' acts as a secure vault and communication hub, ensuring privacy and control. The city is bathed in a warm, inviting glow, symbolizing user empowerment. Small UI elements float subtly, showing data permissions and secure connections. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with vibrant colors and clear details, conveying a sense of security and user control.
